title: Race to Succeed Boris Johnson as U.K. Prime Minister Begins
sub_head: Conservative Party lawmakers are jockeying for position in a crowded field
body:
LONDON—Lawmakers from Britain’s Conservative Party began jostling to take over from outgoing Prime Minister Boris Johnson, as the ruling party licks its wounds following a brutal internal struggle to unseat its leader.
After an unprecedented mutiny, Mr. Johnson announced Thursday that he would resign once his successor is found, triggering a scramble to find his replacement. Mr. Johnson, felled by numerous scandals, spent several days this week clinging to power before a wave of resignations forced his hand.
